Text: funny movie john candys last one
This is a funny movie, John is def. missed, but Canadian Bacon is actually his last. http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0001006/

Wrong. Canadian Bacon was filmed before Wagons East. He died the night they wrapped Wagons East making Wagons East his last film. Canadian Bacon was released a year after his death, and after Wagons East, making it his last released film. But Wagons East was definitely the last film he worked on
